attributes.action: Consider targeting the household fuel companies on their yearly increases and big profits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: rather than paying more money to low income families to help them with their fuels bills.  Big hikes in prices have affected everyone.  My family just come out of the low income bracket by the width of a hair.  All our bills not just utility bills have soared by large % increases.  Why should our taxes help low income families when they appear to be better off financially than those just above the low income bracket.
